tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE refugee_employment (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  employment_status VARCHAR(50),
  skills TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE job_openings (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company VARCHAR(100),
  job_title VARCHAR(100),
  skills_required TEXT,
  salary DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE job_matches (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  refugee_id INT,
  job_id INT,
  match_score DECIMAL(5, 2),
  datetime_matched TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE refugee_profile (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name STRING,
  age INT,
  employment_status STRING,
  skills STRING[]
)

CREATE TABLE job_opportunities (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  title STRING,
  description STRING,
  salary INT,
  location STRING
)

CREATE TABLE matched_jobs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  refugee_id UUID,
  job_id UUID,
  match_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE skills_catalog (
  skill_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  skill_name STRING
)

CREATE TABLE refugee_details (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    employment_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE job_openings (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    job_title VARCHAR(100),
    job_description TEXT,
    required_skills VARCHAR(255),
    salary DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE job_applications (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_id UUID,
    job_id UUID,
    application_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);
